subject: ATTENTION
body:
ATTENTION
Today We the United Bank of American has decided to package your total fund of USD $25.5 Million to ensure you confirm your Consignment safely. We don't want to delay your fund anymore and that's the main reason we decided to package it in a Consignment box and will be sent to you through DHL Company as the Consignment is currently with them now.
You have to contact the DHL Manager Mr. Michael  Wilkeys with your delivery particulars such as;
Name:
Country:
Home Address:
Telephone:
Postal Code:
Occupation:
Contact them via email as shown below:
Mr. Michael  Wilkeys / DHL Manager
New York City, E-mail(
specailagentmichaelwilkeys@yahoo.com
)
Write to
Note that the fund is in ATM Master Card. Kindly indicate the registration code of [#909/DHL/2023] to when contacting them and let us know immediately you confirm your Consignment from them. Thanks for being patience while we will be expecting your response.
Yours In Service!
 Mr.Michsel  Wilkeys

subject: Re: ATTENTION
body:
Hello Mr. Wilkeys,

I hope this message finds you well. I received a notification about a package from the United Bank of erican that is currently with DHL. It's quite exciting to hear about this!

Could you please provide me with more details about this package? What does it contain exactly? And how did it come to be in my name?

Also, could you clarify what the "code of DHL" is and where I might find it? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: ATTENTION
body:
Dear Pearl  This is a compensation Fund worth $35.5 million dollars and it’ll be delivered via  Bank of America Scam victims endeavor and the code is to package number until is delivered to your doorstep. Provide your delivery details. Home address, cellphone, airport name 


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

body:

Wow, a million dollars! That's quite a sum. I'm curious, how did I get so lucky to be chosen for this? And could you tell me more about the Bank of Erica Scam victims endeavor? It sounds like an interesting initiative.

As for the package number, is that something I need to keep track of? Also, what happens once it's delivered to my doorstep?

Looking forward to hearing more about this exciting opportunity!
